post.text: "It's time to get out the vote." IWillVote.com VoyaVotar2016.com #JuntosSePuede

comment.author: David
comment.text: AS USUAL THIS EVIL WITCH SHOWED HER TRUE COLORS AT TONIGHT'S DEBATE! DID A TERRIBLE JOB, AS USUAL! NOT WORTH VOTING FOR! DONALD TRUMP DID A GREAT JOB AT THIS DEBATE! VERY RESPECTFUL AND HONEST! DEFINITELY DONALD TRUMP WAS THE CLEAR WINNER TONIGHT AND WILL BE IN NOVEMBER!
